entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as a family member of the Dursleys. She glances at Uncle Vernon in despair.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as a family member of the Dursleys and is described as having a throbbing vein on his temple.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has been expelled from the Ministry of Magic. He is answering Uncle Vernon's questions.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and his dad works at the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an organization that expelled Harry. It is also where Ron's dad works.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon glares at Aunt Petunia.
Harry was expelled from the Ministry of Magic.
Ron's dad works at the Ministry of Magic.
